articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: NASA Announces Moon Mission Astronauts - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The American space agency NASA has chosen its astronaut crew to carry out a planned test mission around the moon next year.
articles.content:
The American space agency NASA has chosen the astronaut crew that will carry out a planned test mission around the moon next year.
The trip is part of NASAs Artemis program, which aims to land the n… [+3728 chars]

articles.author: India Today Video Desk
articles.title: NASA-SpaceX launch: How this device will track Earth's pollution levels from space - India Today - India Today
articles.description: A rocket, launched jointly by NASA and SpaceX, carries a device that will decide whether you can go out for a run or not. Tropospheric Emissions: Monitoring of Pollution or TEMPO is the first space instrument to measure air quality over North America hourly. …
